features: WITH ALOE VERA & CUCUMBER: To soothe and hydrate your skin and help retain moisture, leaving you feeling soft and smooth, while tightening and minimizing your pores
IDEAL FOR NORMAL TO DRY SKIN: A soap-free, daily-use face wash that cleanses, soothes and nourishes your skin with rich, cooling, hydrating action
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: Enjoy the sensory pleasure of a rich, daily face wash that is mild, comfortable and non-drying on your skin
FREE FROM COMMON CONCERNS: Includes ingredients for quality and stability, but remains free from other ingredients such as phthalates, SLS, SLES and parabens
CRUELTY FREE: We care about our furry friends. That’s why we never test our personal care products on animals
body.description: Specially formulated for normal to dry skin, Himalaya Moisturizing Aloe Vera Face Wash is a soap-free, gentle, cream-based cleanser that removes dirt and other impurities while hydrating the skin. Cucumber cools and smooths while Aloe Vera hydrates and nourishes, leaving your skin soft and supple and looking its best.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: While riding through the forests of Burma, our founder, Mr. M. Manal, saw a villager pacify a restless elephant by feeding it the root of the plant Rauwolfia serpentina. Fascinated by the plant's effect on the elephant, he returned home to India to seek scientific evidence for why this particular plant would have such a beneficial, calming effect. Young Manal's mother gave him her bangles to sell so he could pursue his work, and Himalaya was born. Once he fully understood the science behind this special botanical, Mr. Manal bought a hand-operated, tablet-compressing machine and began his work. At night, his shoulders would ache from producing a few hundred tablets, one small tablet at a time. But his hard work paid off. This remarkable plant would later become Serpina, the anti-hypertensive drug in 1934. Himalaya’s legacy has always been one of researching nature and using the tools of modern science to develop and produce Ayurveda-based, pharmaceutical-grade herbal medicine products. And today, that legacy continues. Mr. Manal had a vision of helping people be well. Today, Himalaya Herbal Healthcare has turned a time-honored herbal tradition into a complete range of contemporary, proprietary formulas and single herbs dedicated to making the world well one person at a time. Since 1930, Himalaya has been passionate about the healing wisdom of herbs. We offer a wide range of herbal supplements, toothpaste and personal care products that unlock the powerful healing benefits of herbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well no matter my skin variations.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this face wash because my face had become drier with time and the products I was using made it worse.I've been using this about three times a week, and it has left my skin smooth and soft. It's like a whole new face.My face had all three "climates" . Sometimes normal, sometimes dry, sometimes oily. Not only did this face wash work well whichever day my moody skin acted up, but it was gentle the entire time.You don't need to use much, as a little goes a long way. You will have to rinse your face thoroughly afterward or it will remain.I will definitely be purchasing this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice face wash
reviews.reviewText: I used few other face wash but his one suites my sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have mixed feelings about this product. While I enjoy the scent, I believe that is a bit strong. Also, because of its consistency I didn't feel that it cleaned my skin very well. I liked that it didn't irritate my skin or had any breakouts after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrating and cooling on face
reviews.reviewText: I love love love this face wash I’m on my second bottle , it feels so cooling and hydrating on skin . My skin is mainly oily but I’m doing a treatment for my acne scars and it tends to dry my skin . This cleanser helps my skin feel super clean by removing all makeup without stripping my skin .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: In search to find an inexpensive product that is moisturizing and gentle to wash my face with. The smell of this reminds me of my Grandmothers shore house soap. The kind that is shaped like a sea shell. Sorry thats so specific. It smells alright and ive been using it for about two weeks now. My face feels soft, but not more soft than other products i've tried prior. The biggest upset for me is the facewash is literally a liquid soap matter that dumps out of the bottle. My first use equaled the amount of at least 5 uses due to it spilling all over the tub. Make sure you hold it up right until you're ready to open and pour it out, unless you want it all over your shower and/or body. A couple examples of liquid like substances found "in home" for comparison: clear shampoo, laundry detergent. My dish soap(Dawn). Although all of these I feel may be slightly more thick than this face wash. Some may prefer that, however I do not. I would not recommend this to someone unless I knew standard liquid face wash is what they are looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clears skin if used daily.
reviews.reviewText: It’s absolutely amazing! I use it every morning and have seen incredible results. I also subscribed because it’s just that good so I won’t have to worry about running out!!! 😘

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a great product
reviews.reviewText: Not to be rude or anything but this, dried my skin out so bad. Made my skin super dry and caused breakouts that I’m not used to. 0/10Ladies if you bar early breakout and just get like a pimple or two every couple of weeks and you just want to keep up with your skin. This product is not it! I’m still here trying to figure out how to get my skin to bounce back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I would not recommend this! The smell is pungent and it hasn’t been doing anything for my page
Have tried many but this is the best face wash out there. Keeps face hydrated and not dry

reviews.reviewTitle: Cleans skin well, but too thin and has strong smell
reviews.reviewText: I like this brand in general, and this product is good enough, but it's too thin. As a result, you use more, than it's necessary, and the product runs out faster. Except that, it has quite strong smell - not bad, but I personally don't like cosmetics with strong smell. It works well, though.

I am blown away by how great this face wash is, it takes off all my makeup easily and makes my skin feel incredible. Previously I had bought the Neem Foaming Face Wash but I felt it dried my skin out (I didn't realize it said it was for oily skin) but this Aloe Vera one is incredible for my dry skin.

reviews.reviewTitle: Strong floral scent but cleans nice.
reviews.reviewText: It’s very heavily perfumed for my liking - strong floral scent and I was hoping for a lighter, fresh cucumber/aloe scent which is the reason for 3 stars. In the few times I tried this, it lathered nicely and didn’t dry out my skin but I won’t continue with it. If you don’t mind floral scented cleansers, you will likely enjoy this cleanser but if you prefer mild or non-scented, avoid this one.
I like this face wash its very hydrating for my skin, but the consistency is way too thin i mean we cannot put this face wash upside down so it will leak out of closed lid be careful
